input.sentences: this is a picture of a group .
this is a picture of two people .
this is a picture of a group of friends .
this is a picture of a stage .
this is a picture of a crowd .
output.sentences: The family gathered together for a photo at the restaurant.
That evening, they went out to a party and saw some men dancing on a table.
The group took another photo together as they continued to enjoy their night.
The left the party and found themselves at a club.
To end the night they took one final photo before they went their separate ways.
